statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ -2 \\ -1 \\ 3 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 0 \\ -3 \\ 2 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ 4 \\ 17 \\ -16 \\ 6 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 6 \\ 18 \\ -19 \\ 9 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 4 \\ -8 \\ -28 \\ 28 \\ -12 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
